title: Charming Film
review: Charming story with quirky characters. Loved Hedy!!!! One for the family!

title: Amazingly well crafted film
review: So big family gathering and we took all the kids, nieces, nephews to see Strike. They all loved it! Some of the characters especially Hedy really resonated with the gang. Waaaaaay better than most of the generic rubbish hoist upon us nowadays

title: Great Family Film
review: Have watched many films over the last few weeks with the Kids. This had something for everyone. Both the kids and us (Mum & Dad) laughed! The story totally captures you, we even had the kids cheering on Mungo at the end. Fantastic!
